SpeakerInfo.div: zōt ud rāspīg: Kotwal und Boyd; zōt: Anklesaria.

Commentary.ab: Y0.12a haiϑiiā.varəštąm.] cod.; Geldner haiϑiiāuuarštąm.; Kellens haiϑiiā. varəštąm.

Parallels.ab: haiϑiiā.varəštąm hiiat̰ vasnā fərašō.təməm quotes Y50.11; = Y64.8, Y65.14.

Nerangs.ab: barsom frōd ō ī barsomdān nihišn xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ tarōidīte aŋhrahe maińiiə̄uš haiϑiiāuuarštąm hiiat̰ vasnā fərašōtəməm
"He should put the barsom on the barsomdān (and then recite:) xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ tarōidīte aŋhrahe maińiiə̄uš haiϑiiāuuarštąm hiiat̰ vasnā fərašōtəməm"
frōd nišastan barsom ō ī barsomdān nihādan ka nē nihēd ā nē šāyēd xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ tarōidīte aŋhrahe maińiiə̄uš haiϑiiāuuarštą hiiat̰ vasnā fərašōtəməm

"He should sit down and put the barsom on the barsomdān. It is not permissible not to lay it down. (Then he has to say:) xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ tarōidīte aŋhrahe maińiiə̄uš haiϑiiāuuarštąm hiiat̰ vasnā fərašōtəməm."

Quotations.ab: pad haiθiiā.varštąm barsom frōd ō barsomdān nihišn ka nē nihēd ā nē šāyēd
"At haiθiiā.varštąm he should lay down the barsom on the barsomdān; it is not permissible not to lay it down."

ModernPractice.ab: "Both priests declare their firm desire to please Ahura Mazda with truthful actions which repudiate Ahriman (khshnaothra ... haithyā-varshtām). While saying this the zōt once again bends over and scoops water with his right hand from the large basin and sprinkles it on the date-palm cord."
